casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Appellee, v. Charles SORRENTO, Appellant. No. 36. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 24, 1942. Richard A. Grimm, of Buffalo, N. Y., for appellant. Robert M. Hitchcock, of Buffalo, N. Y., for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed on authority of Davis v. United States, 5 Cir., 12 F.2d 253, 256; Caringella v. United States, 7 Cir., 78 F.2d 563, .567; United States v. Smith, 2 Cir., 112 F.2d 83, 85; and Firotto v. United States, 8 Cir., 124 F.2d 532, 535, 536.
